It is really beautiful, there are traditional architectural styles everywhere, people are following the traditional cultural way, everything is so natural and beautiful, but the only problem is that there are really too many tourists

The characteristics of Hanok in Beicun can be summarized as two points, namely "old method of evolution" and "decorative tendency". Although compared with traditional Hanok, there is no complete character; Such as lower roof slope, round beams, double eaves, narrow and multi-room numbers, but the North Village Hanok condenses the structure and beauty of Hanok. From the Hanok advertisement at that time, it reflected the requirements of urban housing such as density and anonymity, and the Hanok in Beicun, as a new urban housing type, has continued to develop to this day.

The cultural center of Hanok Village in Beicun is in this Hanok, where it not only introduces the history of the entire North Village but also introduces the traditions. Some folk culture of Korean houses, including pickled kimchi and ginseng wine, are not bad.

When we talk about the image of Seoul, we think of “building forest” first. It is a place that broke my concept of hometown. I think it is the place where hanok was the most handsome place in modern times.

North Village Hanok is a famous attraction in Seoul, and it is also a must-see attraction. It is a traditional old house building, a bit similar to the hutongs and courtyards in old Beijing. There are still people living here, so remember not to make loud noises, do not disturb the residents, the scenery is very beautiful, It is very close to Gyeongbokgung Palace and Qingwatai.

Before visiting Beicun, it is recommended to come here, there is a large map in Chinese. We just didn't come here, lost our way in Beicun, and couldn't find the most classic sixth scene. I had to come back to get the map, and then follow the map to find the classic scenery. There are volunteers here, and there are some exhibitions of Korean culture.

As a foreigner, you must go to the area of Hanok Village in Beicun when you come to play. You can get a large map inside, and then it is more convenient to press the map to ask for directions. You can see some introductions and displays in the cultural center. There is an English introduction. Every day activities can be seen at the door. When we went, it was to draw sunflowers. Free to participate. The postcards at the gift shop at the door are very delicate.

When I visited Hanok Village, I saw the Folk Experience Center, which has a museum for making Hanfu, experiencing rope knot production, winemaking and other traditional crafts, but the world opened late. The traditional Hanok here has been inherited from generation to generation. The significance is very high. You can see from the car and the courtyard that the residents here live low-key but have a higher identity.

I plan to go to Nanshan to enjoy the red maple tomorrow. I didn't think that I had encountered a small piece of red and burning autumn maple after the ancient temple. The mood was also as warm as fire! Beicun is a traditional Hanwu village, just near Jingfu Palace. It is similar to the old alleys in Beijing, especially suitable for leisurely strolling! Retaining a large area of the most traditional Korean brick and tile board houses, low eaves and overhead floors in the house are the biggest characteristics, feel very comfortable and comfortable living way.

It belongs to the more historical cultural center of Korea and is also a must-see attraction in Seoul. This is a century-old ancient house, and now there are people living, so in addition to not disturbing, you can't destroy the flowers and plants in front of the house. It is also a good material for taking pictures.

Don't make loud noises when you arrive in Beicun, the surrounding area is full of residents. The uncle of the commentator said that because tourists flock to it, it is very lively. Every year, many residents of Beicun run to the government to make trouble and hope to return them to quiet. The Beicun Cultural Center is a well-preserved Hanok complex. It is a good place to understand traditional Korean culture. It is a bit like our hutong. The cultural center is free of charge. It is worth seeing and has ethnic characteristics.

The Beicun Cultural Center is a large-family mansion in the end of the Korean era on the basis of retaining traditional Hanok characteristics, converted and repaired. The promotional exhibition hall with Chinese subtitles and explanation videos also has Dongwu, Hanok toilets, gift shops to deeply experience the unique taste of Beicun.

I have already passed by, and I turned back and came in and looked at it. It is very feel. There is a house that introduces Beicun. There are maps, brochures and the like of Beicun in various languages. There are not many people. It is still very comfortable to sit down and rest.

South Korea has many exhibitions and buildings of local and historical representative nature. Hanok Village and here count. Maybe there are Korean girls who are not happy or don't like China. I have met one in Beicun, the degree of evil girl! In short, you can make an appointment and be happy. A major feature of South Korea is sweating. This time I came to this old store Insadong sweating curtain in Seoul. Located on the basement floor of the World Building, the facilities are a bit old, but the popularity is particularly strong. The area of the rest area after the bath is not small, the steaming room is not uncommon, there are 90 degrees high temperature, there are also a dozen degrees low temperature room. There are also many rest rooms that can be spent overnight. The restaurant needs to swipe the card, cold noodles, eggs, rice soup, eat enough to steam, comfortable.

It’s good to go once in winter. The sweat is steamed and steamed, and the proportion of dry is comfortable. It’s also very comfortable to lie in it and fall asleep. There is a snack bar inside, and it’s not clear. As long as you don’t come out, you can stay in it all the time.

Every once in a while, Koreans will go to the steaming hall to report, not only can relax in the high temperature, blood, reduce pressure, but also chat with three or two friends or family, spit, enjoy a rare leisure time.
